body.p: 1. David’s priest or chief official in service at the time of Sheba’s revolt (2 Sm 20:26).
2. Warrior among David’s mighty men, known as “the thirty” (2 Sm 23:26). He was the son of Ikkesh of Tekoa (1 Chr 11:28; 27:9) and became commander of the sixth division of David’s militia.
3. Warrior among David’s mighty men, “the thirty,” identified as an Ithrite (2 Sm 23:38; 1 Chr 11:40; nlt “from Jattir”).
